<div class="vt" id="wikimaincol">
<p>To cancel a user&#x27;s account, make a POST request. If this is an administrator, this will result in the cancellation of all other users in the account. </p>
<h4>
<a name="URL:"></a>URL:<a href="#URL:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p><a href="http://sendible.com/api/v2/account_cancellation.json" rel="nofollow">http://sendible.com/api/v2/account_cancellation.json</a></p>
<h4>
<a name="HTTP_Methods:"></a>HTTP Methods:<a href="#HTTP_Methods:" class="section_anchor"></a>
</h4>
<p>POST </p>
<h4>
<a name="Parameters:"></a>Parameters:<a href="#Parameters:" class="section_anchor"></a>
</h4>
<ul>
<li><tt>application_id</tt>: Your application id from <a href="http://sendible.com/developers" rel="nofollow">http://sendible.com/developers</a>. </li>
<li><tt>reason</tt>: Required. The user&#x27;s reason for cancellation. </li>
</ul>
<h4>
<a name="Authentication:"></a>Authentication:<a href="#Authentication:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user. </p>
<h4>
<a name="Success_Response:"></a>Success Response:<a href="#Success_Response:" class="section_anchor"></a>
</h4>
<pre class="prettyprint">{
   &quot;status&quot;: &quot;OK&quot;
}</pre>
<h4>
<a name="Error_Response:"></a>Error Response:<a href="#Error_Response:" class="section_anchor"></a>
</h4>
<pre class="prettyprint">&lt;error&gt;
&lt;type&gt;InvalidUsernamePassword&lt;/type&gt;
&lt;message&gt;Username/password is invalid.&lt;/message&gt;
&lt;/error&gt;</pre><pre class="prettyprint">&lt;error&gt;
&lt;type&gt;PermissionDenied&lt;/type&gt;
&lt;message&gt;Only an administrator can delete the account.&lt;/message&gt;
&lt;/error&gt;
</pre>
</div>
